backend/core/utils/trace.py.description: @log_process decorator provides structured logging with timing, call depth tracking, and visual tree-style output. Already used in TTSService (generate_speech, create_voice_clone), StorybookService (create_storybook_async), and voice_sync task.

backend/features/auth/service.py.description: AuthService has 5 critical async methods (register, login, google_oauth_login, refresh_access_token, logout) that need @log_process decorator for consistent observability.
